error.message: Class Drupal\dbxschema_mysql\Database\Connection extends deprecated class Drupal\Core\Database\Driver\mysql\Connection. Deprecated in drupal:9.4.0 and is removed from drupal:11.0.0. The MySQL database driver has been moved to the mysql module.
